name: coze-workflow-scheduler
description: Automated Coze workflow scheduler with retry mechanism

env.name: COZE_API_TOKEN
env.description: Your Coze API token for authentication

env.name: COZE_WORKFLOW_ID
env.description: The ID of your Coze workflow

env.name: SCHEDULE_CONFIG
env.description: Schedule configuration (e.g., daily:18:00, cron:0 18 * * *, interval:3600, hourly:30, weekly:monday:18:00, monthly:15:18:00)

env.name: RETRY_DELAY
env.description: Delay in seconds between retry attempts
